posts.content:
Hi,
We have booked a week in June to go to Southern Ireland with the intention
Of starting from Rosslare taking in Waterford, Cork round the ring of kerry
And return.
Campsites generally on this route (looking on the net) seem very thin on the ground
Has anyone got any recommendations? (Even if its slightly off our route and worthwhile)
Im also trying to cover all the bases with a few VW garages to put into my mobile
if the worst happens!
Again not having much luck
Any feedback much appreciated
Gary

Hi Gary..,

We are doing the same trip first two weeks in July so please keep in touch and let me know how you get on...

http://www.camping-ireland.ie/parks.html there's some nice campsites on here, ive stayed in a good few if you need more info.
a couple of garages also http://www.vwspares.ie/contactus
krazykombis. comhttp://www.vwspares.ie/contactus
eircooled.com is a good forum for info , also t2 ireland. Hope this helps.

We are going away first week in August ( typically disorganised, nothing booked yet) and thinking of possibly Ireland - wondering how you guys got on and if any tips etc??

Cheers for any help!
